code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function WeatherPage(){const[city,setCity]=useState('');const[weather,setWeather]=useState(null);const[error,setError]=useState('');const fetchWeather=async()=>{try{const res=await axios.get(`http://localhost:5050/api/weather/${city}`);setWeather(res.data);setError('');}catch(err){setError('Êü•ËØ¢Â§±Ë¥•ÔºåËØ∑Ê£ÄÊü•ÂüéÂ∏ÇÂêçÁß∞„ÄÇ');setWeather(null);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-8 max-w-md mx-auto",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-blue-600",children:"\u5929\u6C14\u67E5\u8BE2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:city,onChange:e=>setCity(e.target.value),placeholder:"\u8BF7\u8F93\u5165\u57CE\u5E02\u540D\u79F0\uFF0C\u5982\uFF1ABeijing",className:"w-full px-4 py-2 border rounded mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:fetchWeather,className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded hover:bg-blue-700",children:"\u67E5\u8BE2\u5929\u6C14"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-red-500 mt-4",children:error}),weather&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6 bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded shadow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold",children:weather.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF21\uFE0F \u6E29\u5EA6\uFF1A",weather.main.temp,"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF25\uFE0F \u5929\u6C14\uFF1A",weather.weather[0].description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83D\uDCA8 \u98CE\u901F\uFF1A",weather.wind.speed," m/s"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["\uD83C\uDF21\uFE0F \u6E7F\u5EA6\uFF1A",weather.main.humidity,"%"]})]})]});}export default WeatherPage;
